trans-unit.source: Represents the primary key field or fields of a record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 表示主索引鍵欄位或資料繫結控制項中記錄的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class is used to represent the primary key for a record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別用來表示資料繫結控制項中的記錄的主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The primary key for a record can be composed of one of more fields from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 記錄的主索引鍵是所組成的其中一個資料來源的多個欄位。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class is not a collection, it can store multiple key field values.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別不是集合，它可以儲存多個索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The key field values are populated when one of the constructors for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class is called.
trans-unit.target: 當一個時，會擴展索引鍵欄位值的建構函式的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve a key field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取索引鍵欄位值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件如下：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to retrieve a key field value at a specific index in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以擷取位於指定索引中的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to retrieve a key field value of a specific field.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性擷取特定欄位的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A> property to retrieve the value of the key field at index 0 in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A>屬性，以擷取中位於索引 0 的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is often used as a shortcut to retrieve the key value of a record when the primary key contains only one field.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於較快速的主索引鍵包含一個欄位時，擷取的索引鍵值的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> property to create an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object that can be used to iterate through the key field values.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>可用來逐一查看索引鍵欄位值的物件。

trans-unit.source: In general, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects are automatically generated by data-bound controls when the control's `DataKeyNames` property is set.
trans-unit.target: 一般情況下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件自動產生的資料繫結控制於何時控制項的`DataKeyNames`屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects contain the values of the key field or fields specified in the `DataKeyNames` property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件包含索引鍵欄位或欄位中指定的值`DataKeyNames`屬性。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that display a single record at a time (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) generally store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object for the current record displayed in the `DataKey` property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一次顯示單一記錄的資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>) 通常儲存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件目前的記錄顯示在`DataKey`控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls that display multiple records at a time (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) generally store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects for each record in the control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection.
trans-unit.target: 一次顯示多筆記錄的資料繫結控制項 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>) 通常儲存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件在控制項中的每一筆記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection is then stored in the `DataKeys` property of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合會儲存在`DataKeys`控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to determine the primary key value of a record in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷中記錄的主索引鍵值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> that contains the key field values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，包含索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class using the specified dictionary of key field values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之索引鍵欄位值的字典初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class using the specified dictionary of key field values.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別使用指定的索引鍵欄位值的字典。

trans-unit.source: The field values contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的欄位值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件傳入的`keyTable`參數用來填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: This version of the constructor does not allow you to specify a list of field names in advance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的建構函式不允許您指定的欄位名稱清單事先<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the field names are not specified in advance, both the field names and values are stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 因為未事先指定的欄位名稱，欄位名稱和值會儲存檢視狀態中。

trans-unit.source: To specify a list of field names in advance, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要事先指定的欄位名稱清單，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.%23ctor%28System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The key field values.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contain the names of the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 字串的陣列，包含索引鍵欄位的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之索引鍵欄位值的字典和欄位名稱的陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別使用指定的索引鍵欄位值的字典和陣列的欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The field values contained in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的欄位值<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件傳入的`keyTable`參數用來填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: This constructor also allows you to specify a list of the key field names for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object in advance through the `keyNames` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式也可讓您指定的索引鍵欄位名稱清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件事先透過`keyNames`參數。

trans-unit.source: Because the field names are specified in advance, only the key field values are stored in view state when this constructor is used.
trans-unit.target: 事先指定的欄位名稱，因為只有索引鍵欄位的值為儲存在檢視狀態時使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 比較的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: object.
trans-unit.target: 物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> array is equal to the current data key.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 陣列是否等於目前的資料索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件是否正在追蹤它的檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 正在追蹤檢視狀態變更，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性用來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件正在追蹤其檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class, you can override this property to indicate whether view-state changes are tracked.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />類別，您可以覆寫這個屬性，指出是否會追蹤檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of a key field from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件中的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to retrieve the key field value.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取索引鍵欄位值之以零起始的索引處。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field at the specified index from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件中之指定索引處的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 指定之索引處的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29> property to retrieve the value of the key field at the specified index in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29>屬性，以擷取在指定索引處的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29> property to retrieve a key field value by field name.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29>屬性，以擷取索引鍵欄位值依欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29> property to retrieve a key field value from a specific index in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29>屬性來擷取中的特定索引的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the key field for which to retrieve the key field value.
trans-unit.target: 用以擷取索引鍵欄位值的索引鍵欄位名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field with the specified field name from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件中具有指定之欄位名稱的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field with the specified field name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之欄位名稱的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29> property to retrieve the value of the specified key field from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29>屬性，以擷取從指定的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29> property to retrieve a key field value by index.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.Int32%29>依索引擷取索引鍵欄位值的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29> property to retrieve a key field value from a specific index in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%28System.String%29>屬性來擷取中的特定索引的索引鍵欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.LoadViewState%2A> method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.LoadViewState%2A>方法用來載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is not <see langword="null" /> and cannot be resolved to a valid <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 不為 <see langword="null" /> 且無法解析為有效的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" />。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to load the view state for the object.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以實作您自己的常式，以載入檢視狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件的目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件的儲存狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.SaveViewState%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.SaveViewState%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別來儲存物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to save the view state for the object.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以實作您自己的常式，以儲存檢視狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件是否正在追蹤它的檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 正在追蹤檢視狀態變更，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23IsTrackingViewState%2A> property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23IsTrackingViewState%2A>屬性用來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件正在追蹤其檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A> method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A>方法用來載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件的目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件的儲存狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>類別來儲存物件的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 標示起點，在開始追蹤並儲存檢視狀態變更至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 將標示要開始追蹤並儲存變更的起始點覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件做為物件的檢視狀態的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 標示起點，在開始追蹤並儲存檢視狀態變更至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 將標示要開始追蹤並儲存變更的起始點覆寫這個方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件做為物件的檢視狀態的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to track the view state of the object.
trans-unit.target: 在擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />類別，您可以覆寫這個方法以實作您自己的常式，來追蹤物件的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the key field at index 0 in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件中之索引 0 處的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key field at index 0 in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 中之索引 0 處的索引鍵欄位值。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> property to retrieve a key field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A> property as a shortcut to determine the value of the key field at index 0 in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 而不是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Item%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A>屬性來擷取索引鍵欄位值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A>屬性做為判斷中位於索引 0 的索引鍵欄位值的捷徑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to determine the key field value of a record when the record has only one key field.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於決定記錄的索引鍵欄位值時記錄有只有一個索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object does not contain any key fields, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件不包含任何索引鍵欄位，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A> property to determine the primary key value of a record.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Value%2A>屬性來判斷主索引鍵值的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> object that contains every key field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> 物件，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 物件中的每個索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" /> that contains every key field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 中的每個索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> property to retrieve an <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object that contains every key field in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A>屬性，以擷取<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件，其中包含在每個索引鍵欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object is often used to iterate through the key fields of a record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件通常用來逐一查看一筆記錄的索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何逐一查看<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>所傳回物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey.Values%2A>屬性。
